body_html:
@snnn Ok, but I just don't understand how tensorflow fails on this. If it uses cuda api, so does my cuda app, which works. I simply find it strange. Or it uses some really low-level driver API, then it's a different story.
Apparently, some calls to api work, and others fail.

And I can't even grep the source code for this error message, which is probably the most annoying thing. Where does this error message live? Nobody knows :)

Whatever. Thanks and sorry for interrupting, maybe I will investigate it later.

body:
@snnn Ok, but I just don't understand how tensorflow fails on this. If it uses cuda api, so does my cuda app, which works. I simply find it strange. Or it uses some really low-level driver API, then it's a different story.
Apparently, some calls to api work, and others fail.

And I can't even grep the source code for this error message, which is probably the most annoying thing. Where does this error message live? Nobody knows :)

Whatever. Thanks and sorry for interrupting, maybe I will investigate it later.
